name: Lalit Transformers
overview:
Incorporated in the year 1996, at Ghaziabad (Uttar Pradesh,India), we, “Lalit Transformers”, are successfully ranked amongst the top manufacturers, supplier & service provider of a wide range of Power Transformers, Distribution Transformer, Servo Stabilizer, Circuit Breaker, Motor Rewinding & Repairing Service, Electrical Switches & Electrical Panels.

Our Quality: Our quality standards makes us a reputed organization. We use only quality raw material to manufacture the products. To obtain highest degree of excellence, our quality auditors stringently test the offered products by doing internal audits of the products during the manufacturing and before the dispatch.

Our Team: Our organization have hired a team of highly efficient and competent professionals. These professionals are well aware of their tasks and have knowledge in their respective domains. These professionals work in perfect co-ordination within the team and ensure streamlined operational efficiency. Also, we provide various training sessions and seminar to our brilliant professionals in order to improve their knowledge and skills.

Why Us?: International quality standard range Well equipped manufacturing facility Expert team of engineers, industrial designers and other supporting staff Customized packaging Competitive prices

Infrastructure: We have established a highly advanced and state-of-the-art infrastructure that is spread across a wide area. Our Manufacturing unit is equipped with latest machinery and advanced technologies, which allow us to fabricate and distribute the superior quality range of transformers.
